trans-unit.source: A composite activity that contains a collection of event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 複合活動，包含事件處理常式的集合。

trans-unit.source: It is typically used where a collection of events must be handled.
trans-unit.target: 它通常用於必須處理事件集合的位置。

trans-unit.source: Each event is handled by one <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity" />, which is part of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: 每個事件是由一個 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity" /> 處理，它是 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity" /> 的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity> activity holds a set of <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> classes, for use by the associated <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity> 活動保留一組 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> 類別，以供相關聯的 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> 使用。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity> activity can only be associated with an <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlingScopeActivity>.

The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity> activity is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, meaning the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity> activity can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity> 活動是 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>，這表示 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity> 活動可包含其他活動。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義的活動名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity" /> class by using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 使用活動的名稱，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the currently executing instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity" /> 之目前執行的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The currently executing instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity" /> 之目前執行的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="childactivity" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="childactivity" /> 為 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)。

trans-unit.source: The executable activities do not contain the <paramref name="childactivity" />.
trans-unit.target: 可執行活動不包含 <paramref name="childactivity" />。

trans-unit.source: The object that raised the event.
Defines the processing procedure when the subscribed-to event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 定義發生訂閱事件時的處理程序。
